Content:
What goal do you have
My goals is  
Financial security
Making a difference
Leadership development

What challenges do you face
I face the challenge of  
Financial constraints
Time management
Lack of resources

What short-term objective do you have
My short-term objective is to  
Increase salary
Develop a professional network
Get promoted

What long-term objective do you have
My long-term objective is to  
Run my business
Secure a rewarding job
Become a manager

How do you handle obstacles
I handle obstacles by  
Remaining positive
Taking action
Breaking down the problem

What action do you take to reach your goals
I to reach my goals 
Set clear objectives
Stick to the plan
Create a timeline

What is your biggest challenge when starting here
When starting here my biggest challenge comes from  
Technical skills
Decision-making
Adapting to changes

How do you handle that
I to overcome it 
Take online courses
Develop a plan of action
Change my mindset

What skills are most important for excelling here
can help you excel in this organization 
Analytical thinking
Attention to detail
Organizational skills

Why do you think so
It will help you to  
Make decisions based on data
Avoid making mistakes
Improve the overall quality

What can be done to increase work efficiency
It's important to  
Eliminate distractions
Take ownership of your work
Make use of technology

How can I make the most of my internship for future success
I found it helpful to  
Seek out mentorship
Participate in company events
Listen to feedback

Are you open to trying something new and different
I am to try something different 
Very eager
Quite hesitant

If you want what kind of side hustle are you considering
I have bought about  
Selling crafts online
Starting a blog
Freelancing on side

What makes you do that
This could be really valuable for  
Showcasing my creativity
Building a community
Paying off debt

How much extra money do you think you could make
I could make about extra per month 
Two hundred dollars
Two million dong

Have you considered the potential risks or downsides
I know that taking on a side hustle could mean  
Dragging down the main job's performance
Overworking ourselves
Increasing our workload

How do you get through it
I think the key to  
Prioritize some tasks
Practice self-care
Prioritize ypur main job

What is the company's direction for me in the next 3 months
We want you to  
Lead the sales team
Improve your skills beforehand
Switch to product development

What can I currently do to have the highest impract on the company
You can  
Coordinate the team to develop an effective sales process
Focus on the market research project
Give priority to creating engaging content

Are there any upcoming projects for our company
We will be working on  
The launch of a new product
A marketing campaign
The execution of a sales strategy

Am I good match for any those projects
Based on your skills you are  
A perfect fit
Not quite the right fit
Lacking the necessary expertise

What do I need to do to achieve that
To get that it is essential to focus on  
Creating measurable impacts with data-driven strategies
Gaining an overview of team activities
Enhancing specialized expertise

How soon can I reach my target position mentioned earlier
The time to reach your desired position depends on  
Your career progression
Your capacity to tackle new obstacles
Your willingness to learn

I think can be your role models 
The top performers
The senior executives
The industry experts

What can I learn from them
They can offer you guidance on  
Smart approach strategies
Organizational communication
Insights into markets

How should we format our CV
When it comes to CV formatting it is best to  
Use clear headings
Use a professional font
Maintain consistent formatting

What are some tips when writing a CV
It is important to  
Tailor it to the specific job
Highlight your relevant skills
Highlight accomplishments

What is the most important information employers want to know
You definitely should include in the CV 
Your education
Your work experience
Your certifications

Why do they focus on this particular section
It helps them to  
Briefly review your background
See if you match their company culture
Assess your capabilities

What should we add in the CV if we lack experience
If you lack experience your CV should include any information about  
Your intership
Your volunteer work
Your part-time jobs

Why do you think so
It could demonstrate  
Your practical experience
Your willingess to learn
Your initiative
